Weathermaster:
P_45. The Sunshine of Spring
Actualized by temporarily raising a sun-like fire and by outputting the energy produced from the heat generated by Pa'agrio's fire through the Weathermaster. Outputting is currently halted due to an error occurring in the safety device. *The energy input for Pa'agrio's fire is still in progress. Critical mass to be reached soon. Adjustment necessary* [Quest _120_PavelsResearch 32042-09.htm|Stop it]
